ComicInfo.Summary:
The entire universe is in peril. Trillions of lives at stake. There’s an omniscient and omnipotent darkness coming. It has never lost a battle. But don’t worry…Prince Valiant has a sword…
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ A/Reg | Regular Cover | Jonathan Lau & Omi Remalante | 1 | B/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Cover | Jonathan Lau | 2 | C/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive Cover | Stephen Downey | 3 | D/RI | 1:25 Retailer Incentive"Black & White"Cover | Stephen Downey | 4 |

ComicInfo.Title: Long Live King Valiant
